lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Negotiating Price and Payment Terms

sentence.idiomatic: I've forgotten what you said at the time.
At the time, I was sleeping. I didn't hear the doorbell ring.
Then where did you go?
I will buy the item from whoever gives me a low quote.
The actual price of it is a lot lower than the quote.
What is the quoted price for this kind of car?
Recently the US dollar has depreciated. I'm making a lot less money.
Is the Renminbi depreciating?
When a new car comes out the price is very high, but it loses its value very quickly.
The government has adjusted the import/export duties on some goods.
Last month the company adjusted the staff's wages.
Right now the stock market is so good, I want to readjust my investment direction a bit.
It's agreed--tomorrow afternoon we will go swimming.
I have agreed to go to Beijing with him.
We agreed to meet at 5 o'clock, how is it that you didn't arrive until 7 o'clock?
You must be trustworthy when doing business.
Don't collaborate with him. He is an untrustworthy person.
People cannot be untrustworthy. What one promises to do, one must do.
We are discussing where to go to have some fun.
I have to talk this matter over with my family a bit.
If there are any issues, everyone can discuss them together.
We have already taken out a letter of credit with the bank.
His illness is very serious. This is the certification issued by the hospital.
When you are buying things, don't forget to get a written receipt.
Mr. Li, this is Peter.
Oh! What is it?
The hammer price isn't right. It's higher than the quote you gave me.
Peter, you know that recently the American dollar has depreciated. We've had to revise our prices.
But we already agreed on the price. You can't be untrustworthy.
There's nothing I can do either.
Then I'm afraid we can't work together.
Peter, amiability will get you rich. We can discuss it.
Well, I'm not paying the cash advance. The entire payment will be made prior to shipping.
What? Without money, how can we manufacture?
Looks like there's no more room for negotiation.
How about this: No cash advance is all right. But you have to provide a letter of credit.
OK. Mr. Li, I hope you can include labels for each box.
Can do! Consider it a new friendship.
Yes, there's money for us all to make.
Oh, your money is not easy to earn!

word.literal: to go back on one's word
